content.text:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                      Linkin Park - Qwerty
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Hello, this is chord tab of Linkin Park's "Qwerty", tabbed by me, last! If you wanna ask 
contact at samuel_25april@yahoo.com. Enjoy this rock song!!!


[Intro] [ch]C#5[/ch] [ch]E5[/ch] [ch]B5[/ch] (8x)
[alternative chords (quick): [ch]C#5[/ch] [ch]E5[/ch] [ch]F#5[/ch] [ch]E5[/ch] 
[ch]C#5[/ch] [ch]E5[/ch] [ch]Eb5[/ch] [ch]D5[/ch] (8x)]
[For the first fourth times, play smoothly, then for the next play ROCKly!]
[After that, follow the chords below]
[ch]C#5[/ch] (16x) [ch]C#5[/ch] [melodic]

         [ch]C#5[/ch] [melodicly]
I didn't think that I had a debt to pay
'Til they came to take what I had left away
You said you wouldn't put me to the test today
But I remember you saying that yesterday
There was a time when your mind wasn't out of control
Every memory and confession born out of your soul
Like a pill you couldn't swallow so it swallowed you whole
                                                          [ch]A5[/ch]
Another lie hard to follow, it followed you home and like that

Broken down
  [ch]G#5[/ch]    [ch]B5[/ch]        [ch]C#5[/ch]
A victim of your.. lies!

[Chorus]
[ch]E5[/ch]  [ch]F#5[/ch]  [ch]G#5[/ch]      [ch]C#5[/ch]
You hide behind.. lies!
[ch]E5[/ch]  [ch]F#5[/ch]   [ch]G#5[/ch]    [ch]C#5[/ch]
You don't know.. why!
[ch]E5[/ch]  [ch]F#5[/ch]       [ch]G#5[/ch]
You crossed the line
[ch]A5[/ch]           [ch]G#5[/ch]  [ch]B5[/ch]   [ch]C#5[/ch]
Wrapped up inside your lies!!
[ch]E5[/ch]  [ch]F#5[/ch]  [ch]G#5[/ch]      [ch]C#5[/ch]
You hide behind.. lies!
[ch]E5[/ch]    [ch]F#5[/ch] [ch]G#5[/ch] [ch]A5[/ch]                [ch]C#5[/ch]
You're lost inside that cold disguise
  [ch]D5[/ch]   [ch]F#5[/ch]  [ch]C#5[/ch]
Behind your lies!!!

[Interlude] [ch]C#5[/ch] (8x)

[ch]D5[/ch] [melodic]
I don't know what I thought I might say
Seems like we never would talk the right way
Every other minute I fought for my place
And drop what I made thought you might say so
I'm guessing that you probably know
When your inside's hollow and you want to be cold
Like a pill hard to swallow so it swallowed you whole
                                                          [ch]A5[/ch]
Another lie hard to follow, it followed you home and like that

Broken down
  [ch]G#5[/ch]    [ch]B5[/ch]        [ch]C#5[/ch]
A victim of your.. lies!

[Back to Chorus]

[Interlude] [ch]C#5[/ch] (8x)
[ch]C#5[/ch] [ch]E5[/ch] [ch]F#5[/ch] [ch]E5[/ch] [ch]C#5[/ch] [ch]C#5[/ch] [ch]E5[/ch] 
[ch]D5[/ch] (4x)

[Chords: [ch]C#5[/ch] [ch]E5[/ch] [ch]F#5[/ch] [ch]E5[/ch] [ch]C#5[/ch] [ch]C#5[/ch] 
[ch]Eb5[/ch] [ch]D5[/ch] (4x)]
You're faking, you're mistaken
If you think that you could climb out of this hole
Forsaken, what would take me
Analyzing by the power of your soul

[ch]A5[/ch]
 Broken down
  [ch]G#5[/ch]    [ch]B5[/ch]        [ch]C#5[/ch]
A victim of your.. lies!

[smooth]
[ch]C#5[/ch]
You hide behind.. lies
you don't know why
You hide behind.. lies
               [ch]C#5[/ch]
you don't know why
You hide behind.. lies
you don't know why
You hide behind..
[ch]A5[/ch]           [ch]G#5[/ch]  [ch]B5[/ch]   [ch]C#5[/ch]
Wrapped up inside your lies!!!
[alternative chords: using the chorus chords]

[Then, rock again!]
[Back to Chorus]

[Coda] [ch]C#5[/ch] [long]

Have you enjoyed this song??!! (YES!)
